Philip G. Brodrick is a Data Scientist at the Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA, working on the science and application of imaging spectroscopy.

## Education

- [PhD in Energy Systems Engineering]{.fw-bold} | Stanford University, USA | 2012 -  2017
- [MS in Renewable and Clean Energy]{.fw-bold} | University of Dayton, USA  | 2010 - 2012  
- [BS in Physics]{.fw-bold} | University of Dayton, USA  | 2008 - 2010  

## Professional Experience

- [2023-present:]{.fw-bold} Project Algorithm Scientist, SBG-VSWIR Imaging Spectrometer Mission
- [2022-present:]{.fw-bold} Project Algorithm Scientist, EMIT Imaging Spectrometer Mission
- [2019-present:]{.fw-bold} Data Scientist, Jet Propulsion Laboratory
